org.lunifera.runtime.utils.osgi.component

Class AbstractComponentBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lunifera.runtime.utils.osgi.component.AbstractComponentBasic
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractComponentWithCompendium

    public abstract class AbstractComponentBasic
extends Object
    A basic abstract parent class for an OSGi Declarative Service based component.

    It has a custom activate() method that set informations collected about the component and has some common useful methods.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Cristiano Gavi√£o

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        protected void activate(org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext componentContext)
                 throws ExceptionComponentLifecycle
        This is the default activate method called by OSGi Declarative Service extender.

        Concrete class can use a @Activate annotation with this method.

        Parameters:
        context -
        Throws:
